definition[0]: a person who cuts, washes, and arranges people’s hair in particular styles
example[0]: I have a hairdresser’s appointment this afternoon.
definition[1]: a man whose job is to cut men’s hair and sometimes to shave them
example[1]: How often do you go the barber’s?
definition[2]: someone who cuts or arranges people’s hair as their job
example[2]: Renee was the top stylist at the salon.
definition[3]: someone whose job is to give beauty treatments to your skin, hair etc
example[3]: Her beautician told her she had problem skin.
